scripts.build:js: cat src/js/config/*.js src/js/utils/*.js src/js/api/*.js src/js/map/*.js src/js/ui/*.js src/js/main.js | npx terser -c -m -o dist/app.min.js
scripts.build:css: npx sass src/scss/main.scss --style=compressed --no-source-map | npx cleancss -o dist/style.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.dev: eval "$(~/.local/bin/mise activate zsh)" && uv run python server.py
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run dev
